name: Maveus
description:
Step into the world of K-pop and join the virtual idol group MAVE: on their journey to stardom! MAVE: is a unique virtual K-pop group that you can interact with through our platform. Chat directly with one of the members (TYRA:) to get to know their personalities and witness their rise to fame.

But that's not all – as a member of MAZE: (the MAVE: fandom), you can create your own mark on the group's success. Use our platform to create your own performance video by adjusting the stage camera for their debut song "PANDORA".

We are committed to providing you with an ever-evolving platform and exciting new content through future updates. So, stay tuned for more features and experiences with MAVE: - The Virtual K-Pop Idol Experience.
